TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: 提供公开 UI 元素基本信息的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties that expose basic information about a UI element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以对如按钮的简单元素的 UI 自动化提供程序实现此接口。This interface can be implemented on UI Automation providers for simple elements such as buttons. 它可以还实现的提供程序提供其他属性或控件模式，或重写现有属性或控件模式，在已有默认提供程序的元素上。It can also be implemented on providers that contribute additional properties or control patterns, or override existing properties or control patterns, on an element that already has a default provider. 为复杂元素的提供程序必须实现或。Providers for complex elements must implement or .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetPatternProvider(int32 patternId) cil managed
Public Function GetPatternProvider (patternId As Integer) As Object

summary.span: 检索一个对象，该对象在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素上提供对控件模式的支持。

span.span: Retrieves an object that provides support for a control pattern on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.

returns.span: 实现模式接口的对象；或者，如果不支持模式，则为 。

span.span: Object that implements the pattern interface, or if the pattern is not supported.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现，该提供程序仅支持。The following example shows an implementation of for a provider that supports only . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetPropertyValue(int32 propertyId) cil managed
Public Function GetPropertyValue (propertyId As Integer) As Object

summary.span: 检索 UI 自动化提供程序支持的某个属性的值。

span.span: Retrieves the value of a property supported by the UI Automation provider.

returns.span: 属性的值；如果此提供程序不支持该属性，则为 ；如果根本不支持该属性，则为 。

span.span: The property value, or a if the property is not supported by this provider, or if it is not supported at all.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供程序应返回仅当显式地隐藏的属性值并且该请求不要传递到其他提供程序。A provider should return only if it is explicitly hiding the property value and the request is not to be passed through to other providers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现为自定义按钮控件。The following code example shows an implementation of for a custom button control. [!code-csharp[UIAProvider_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/CSharp/FragmentRoot.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAProvider_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/VisualBasic/FragmentRoot.vb#102)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HostRawElementProvider As IRawElementProviderSimple

summary.span: 获取此元素的基本提供程序。

span.span: Gets a base provider for this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是一个自定义控件的窗口的 UI 自动化提供程序。This property is the UI Automation provider for the window of a custom control. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 在窗口中承载的控件提供程序实现一起使用此提供程序。 uses this provider in combination with your provider implementation for a control hosted in a window. 例如，从宿主提供程序中获取的元素的运行时标识符。For example, the run-time identifier of the element is obtained from the host provider. 必须在任何以下情况下返回宿主提供程序：A host provider must be returned in any of the following cases: - 此元素是片段的根元素。This element is the root of a fragment. - 该元素是一个简单的元素，如按钮。The element is a simple element such as a pushbutton. - 提供程序是一个重新放置的占位符。The provider is a repositioning placeholder. 在其他情况下，该属性应返回`null`。In other cases, the property should return `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现对于在 Windows 窗体中承载的片段根。The following example code shows an implementation of for a fragment root that is hosted in a Windows form. [!code-csharp[UIAProvider_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/CSharp/FragmentRoot.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAProvider_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/VisualBasic/FragmentRoot.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderOptions As ProviderOptions

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定 UI 自动化提供程序的特征；例如，该程序是客户端还是服务器端提供程序。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies characteristics of the UI Automation provider; for example, whether it is a client-side or server-side provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 在处理不同类型的提供程序不同。 treats different types of providers differently. 例如，从服务器端提供程序的事件会传播至所有侦听 UI 自动化客户端进程，但事件从客户端提供程序仍保留在该客户端进程。For example, events from server-side providers are broadcast to all listening UI Automation client processes, but events from client-side providers remain in that client process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现服务器端 UI 自动化提供程序。The following example code shows an implementation of for a server-side UI Automation provider. [!code-csharp[UIAProvider_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/CSharp/FragmentRoot.cs#104)] [!code-vb[UIAProvider_snip#104](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAProvider_snip/VisualBasic/FragmentRoot.vb#104)]
